Chantix for 1 month. Doc said i would prob need it for 3. I hated it but it worked well. With the exception of when I was pregnant & nursing, I smoked a pack and a half a day for over 35 years. No vape or any other supplement, just the 28 days of chantix at the beginning.

I know the smell is awful.  It was that way when I was pregnant.  How on earth I used to enjoy that? Crazy. 3 months on Chantix w/o a cig and I'm free of both. I'm looking at my psychological triggers. Once I get those, I GOT THIS.

Chantix is scary! It worked for me before my husband passed but because of all the warnings and dealing with depression, I stopped that mess quick. I tried wellbutrin and it did nothing for me. Seems the only answer I have is to stay pregnant but that WON'T  happen again lol.

I quit when I got pregnant. You have to do it. My daughter, sister and brother in law all quit using Chantix. It's a nasty, dirty habit. My husband smokes and no one can stand to be near him. He did good on a Juul for about a month, but relapsed. Good luck.

I started smoking when I was nine. I quit when I was pregnant. Quit five years ago for good.
I don't really have any personal advice. I just didn't buy cigarettes, and drank water when I craved one.
